ORDER: ADAPTIVE STYLE.trigger: When this unit Attacks or is Attacked, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Choose 1:
• This unit gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and +2 to Panic Test rolls against this Attack.
• This Attack gains **Critical Blow** and **Sundering**.
Discard 2 Tactics cards to search your Tactics Deck for any 1 card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

ORDER: CHARGING VOLLEY.trigger: After this unit completes a Ranged Attack:
effect: This unit performs 1 Charge Action on the Defender.

ORDER: COUNTERSTRATEGY.trigger: When an enemy in Short Range uses an Order or is targeted by a Tactics card:
effect: Roll a die. On a 3+, cancel the effect of that Order/Tactics card.
Target 1 friendly House Greyjoy unit in Short Range.
You may remove 1 Pillage token from that unit and then place 1 Pillage token on 1 other friendly House Greyjoy unit in Short Range of them.
Target 1 friendly Greyjoy Infantry unit in Short Range and choose 1:
• That unit restores 2 Wounds.
• That unit may re-roll any Attack Dice this Turn.
• Enemies that Attack that unit this Turn become **Vulnerable**.
This unit suffers 1 Wound. Target all enemies in Short Range. They become **Panicked**.

ORDER: HIDDEN TRAPS.trigger: When an unengaged enemy in Long Range performs any Action, before resolving that Action:
effect: Choose 1:
• That enemy suffers 1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.
• That Enemy suffers -1[MOVEMENT] until the end of the Turn.
Target 1 enemy engaged with this unit. It suffers 2 Hits, +1 Hit for each of this unit’s remaining ranks.

ORDER: INCITE.trigger: When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains **Vicious** and rolls its highest Attack Die Value.
Target 1 friendly Combat Unit in Long Range. Move 1 Pillage token from that unit to 1 other friendly unit with Pillage in Short Range of that unit.
Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 **Ours is The Fury!** and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

ORDER: LANNISTER SUPREMACY.trigger: After an enemy completes an Attack on this unit:
effect: Target the Attacker. They suffer 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll and +1 Wounds on failure for each remaining rank in this unit.

ORDER: LAWS OF THE REALM.trigger: When an enemy in Short Range Attacks, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: That enemy is treated as having -1 rank for Attack Dice. If it has only 1 remaining rank, it becomes **Vulnerable**.
Target 1 enemy in Line of Sight and Long Range. They become **Vulnerable**.

ORDER: MARTIAL TRAINING.trigger: When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack may re-roll any Attack Dice and the Defender becomes **Vulnerable**.

ORDER: NOBLE'S BOLSTER.trigger: When a friendly Combat Unit in Long Range would gain a Condition token:
effect: It does not gain that token.
Instead of Surging Forth, this unit performs 1 Charge or March Action.

ORDER: OVERWATCH.trigger: After an enemy ends a March or Maneuver Action in Long Range and Line of Sight of this unit:
effect: This unit performs 1 Ranged Attack Action on that enemy.

ORDER: PIT FIGHTER RAGE.trigger: When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: The Defender becomes **Vulnerable**, **Panicked** and **Weakened**. After this Attack has been completed, the Attacker suffers 2 Wounds.

ORDER: QUEEN’S BLADE.trigger: When a friendly R’hllor unit in Short Range is Attacked, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 **Baratheon Justice** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

ORDER: QUICK FIRE.trigger: After this unit completes a Maneuver or Retreat Action:
effect: This unit performs 1 Ranged Attack Action.

ORDER: RAVEN FLOCK.trigger: When an enemy in Long Range performs an Attack, before resolving that Attack:
effect: That Attack suffers -1 to Hit.

ORDER: READY! AIM! RELEASE!.trigger: When an enemy performs a Charge Action on this unit, before resolving that Charge Action:
effect: If being Charged from the Front, this unit performs 1 Ranged Attack Action on that enemy using its lowest Attack Die Value.

ORDER: RECKLESS HEROISM.trigger: When this unit performs a Charge Action, before resolving that Action:
effect: This unit suffers D3 Wounds, but counts as rolling a 6 on all Charge Distance Dice.

ORDER: RESILIENCE.trigger: When an enemy is performing an Attack on this unit, after rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This unit only suffers 1 Wound for every 2 unblocked Hits.

ORDER: SCAVENGE.trigger: After an enemy completes an Attack on this unit:
effect: This unit gains 1 Pillage token.
Target 1 enemy in Long Range. Until the end of the Turn, friendly unit’s Attacks on that enemy may re-roll any Attack Dice and gain **Precision**.

ORDER: SENTINEL.trigger: After another friendly unit in Long Range is Attacked:
effect: This unit performs 1 Charge or Maneuver Action. If Charging, it must target the Attacker.
Target all enemies in Short Range. They become Panicked. Roll a die, on a 6, destroy Theon.

ORDER: SET FOR CHARGE.trigger: When this unit is Successfully Charged from the Front or Flank:
effect: If this unit is not engaged with another enemy, it performs 1 Melee Attack Action on the Attacker before they perform their Melee Attack.

ORDER: SHIELD WALL.trigger: When an enemy is performing a Melee Attack on this unit, after rolling Defense Dice:
effect: If this unit is being Attacked from the Front or Flank, it blocks +1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.

ORDER: SHIELDWALL.trigger: When an enemy performs a Melee Attack on this unit, after rolling Defense Dice:
effect: If this unit is being Attacked from the Front or Flank, it blocks +1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.
Target 1 enemy in Long Range. They suffer 1 Morale Test with -1 to their roll for each of their destroyed ranks. On a failure, they lose all Abilities until the end of the Round.

ORDER: SPREAD FEAR.trigger: When an enemy engaged with this unit fails a Panic Test:
effect: Target 1 other enemy in Long Range of this unit. It suffers 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll for each remaining rank in this unit. On failure, it suffers +1 Wound.

ORDER: STARK FURY.trigger: When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains **Critical Blow** and **Sundering**. After completing this Attack, this unit suffers 2 Wounds, -1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

ORDER: STAY AT YOUR POSTS!.trigger: When a friendly unit in Short Range passes a Morale Test:
effect: That unit restores 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
This unit suffers 1 Wound. Target 1 enemy in Long Range. They gain 1 Condition token.

ORDER: SUPERIOR FLANKING.trigger: When a friendly unit in Long Range performs an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: If Attacking the Defender in the Flank or Rear, the Defender becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.
This unit suffers up to 3 Wounds. Restore 1+ that many Wounds to 1 other friendly unit in Long Range.

ORDER: SWIFT RETREAT.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack on this unit:
effect: This unit performs 1 Retreat Action.
Target 1 friendly unit in Short Range. They perform a 3" shift.
Destroy this model and replace it with 1 destroyed Infantry Attachment. That Attachment gains **Order: Taking a New Name**. It counts as already having been used this Round.

ORDER: TAUNT.trigger: When an enemy in Long Range Activates:
effect: If that enemy could Attack or Charge this unit, and declares any Action other than an Attack or Charge that targets this unit this Turn, before performing that Action, that enemy becomes **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.

ORDER: THENN SUPREMACY.trigger: After an enemy completes an Attack on this unit:
effect: Target the Attacker. They suffer 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll and +1 Wounds on failure for each remaining rank in this unit.
Target 1 enemy in Line of Sight and Long Range. They become **Weakened**.

ORDER: TO THE LAST!.trigger: When this unit would be destroyed:
effect: This unit performs 1 Morale Test. On a success, it is not destroyed but remains in play with 1 Wound, then becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.
Target 1 enemy within Short Range and Line of Sight of this unit. They become **Vulnerable** or **Weakened**. If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, they become both instead.

ORDER: TROPHY COLLECTING.trigger: After a Rattleshirt's Commander Tactics card is attached to a friendly unit:
effect: Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 of Rattleshirt's Commander Tactics cards and attach it to this unit. Shuffle your Tactics deck.

ORDER: UNSUSPECTING CHARGE.trigger: When a friendly unit in Long Range Activates:
effect: That unit may not be the target of enemy Orders or Tactics cards this Turn. It must perform a Charge as its Action this Turn.
This unit performs 1 Morale Test. On a Success, target 1 enemy in Long Range. It becomes **Panicked** or **Vulnerable**.
Each time a friendly NCU Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Cortnay Penrose's unit performs 1 Maneuver or March Action.*

*Joffrey Baratheon's unit performs 1 Maneuver or March Action.*

You may hold this unit off the table *(In Reserve)* instead of Deploying it. At the start of any Round, if you are not the first player, you may place 1 unit from Reserve fully within Short Range of a Friendly or Flank table edge, unactivated.
If this unit has not performed the Maneuver from Cavalry this Turn, this Attack gains **Precision**, +1 to Hit and becomes [LONGRANGE].
This unit ignores the Dangerous, Hindering, and Rough keywords.

ORDER: DECEITFUL REPOSITION.trigger: At the Start of an enemy Turn, if no enemies are within Short Range:
effect: This unit performs a 3" Maneuver Action.
• Ignores units and terrain when determining Line of Sight.
• When Attacking enemies in the Flank or Rear, this attack gains **Precision** and **Vicious**.
• **Sundering**
• If your opponent does not Control [CROWN], this Attack may re-roll any Attack Dice.
After this unit completes a Melee Attack, if this Attack destroyed an enemy rank, target 1 friendly Infantry unit in Long Range. They restore 2 Wounds.
Beric begins the game with 1 Faith token. Each time his unit passes a Morale Test, it gains 1 Faith token. Faith tokens may be expended to do the following:
**• When this unit performs a Melee Attack, before resolving that Attack:**
This Attack gains +2 Attack Dice.
**• When this unit would be destroyed by a Melee Attack:**
Before being removed, this unit performs 1 Melee Attack using its lowest Attack Die Value. If this Attack destroys the Defender, this unit is not destroyed but remains in play with 1 Wound.
This unit gains +2 to Morale Test rolls and begins the game with 1 Faith token. Each time it passes a Morale Test, it gains 1 Faith token. Faith tokens may be expended to do the following:
**• When this unit performs a Melee Attack, before resolving that Attack:**
This Attack gains **Sundering** and **Vicious**.
**• When an enemy in Long Range fails a Panic Test:**
Target 1 friendly unit in Long Range of this unit. For each Wound the enemy suffered from this test, restore 1 Wound to that friendly unit, up to 3.
Each time this unit Activates, it removes 1 Condition Token. If you Control [CROWN], this unit may restore 1 Wound.
This model counts as Beric Dondarrion for all abilities and effects.
While you Control [CROWN], this unit gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls.
